A demonstration of the divine authority of the law of nature and of the Christian religion in two parts / by Samuel Parker ... Parker, Samuel, 1640-1688.
[7], xlii, [8], 427, [4] p.
Printed by M. Flesher for R. Royston ... and R. Chiswell ..., London : 1681.
Errata: p. 427. Advertisements: p. [1]-[4] at end. Reproduction of original in University of Chicago Library. Pages 55-60 faded in filmed copy. Pages 44-69 photographed from Yale University Library copy and inserted at the end.
